abstract: AOL has scooped up yet another online advertising company — Quigo, a company that has faced off with Google and Yahoo in selling contextual text ads.
snippet: AOL has scooped up yet another online advertising company — Quigo, a company that has faced off with Google and Yahoo in selling contextual text ads.
lead_paragraph: AOL has scooped up yet another online advertising company  this time, one that has faced off with Google and Yahoo in selling contextual text ads, those small, sponsored links that run next to articles.

headline.main: Another Step for a Remade AOL
headline.print_headline: Another Step for a Remade AOL
